install.name: os_ccavenue
install.title: CCAvenue
install.author: Ossolution Team
install.description: CCAvenue Payment Plugin For Events Booking Extension

field.name: mode
field.label: CCAvenue Mode
field.description: Set to Test Mode Or Live Mode

field.name: workingkey
field.label: Working Key
field.description: The working key is the password assigned to you by ccAvenue. Without it, we can not verify the payment responses and all transactions will fail.

field.name: access_code
field.label: Access Code
field.description: The Access Code assigned to you by ccAvenue

field.name: icon
field.label: Icon
field.description: If you want to show icon instead of payment method title on registration form, upload it to media/com_eventbooking/assets/images/paymentmethods folder and enter the name of the file here. For example os_ccavenue.png
